::Spears:;

she fell on the floor from the shaking."OK, That's it! Let me out of 
here!"  She couldn't take much more of this.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker shakes his head, the pod shaking with the storm 
outside. "We've been 
> pressed for resources lately. Before the Cybertronian Fire crashed 
with loads 
> of energon. There's no spare energon here."
> 
> He looks around the pod, and then at Spears. "The storm is going to 
mess with 
> the energy collection by the solar panels. We-"
> 
> A quake goes through the pod, nearly throwing Striker out of his 
seat as the 
> storm passes over the pod, the pod's lights flickering.
